column4: hi.  does anybody have any idea why my windows don't maximze "all the way"?   some compiz setting?
sorry, is it possible to use pastebin? or some other transfer method?
Are you running cairo-dock or any other dok on bottom?
yeah.  cairo, and im sure that's the problem. but some windows open in full.   do you happen to know what setting i have screwed up?
There is a setting in cairo-dock to control this behavior
im sure there is, but after 2 hrs, i can't find it. i AM and idiot, no doubt, but...
plus, when cairo-dock is not running, i have this problem!!
cairo-dock is shut down, and this problem persists
cairo-dock settings>visibility>visibility <-- dont put reserve space for dock
there is no such setting under "visibility"  / maybe in gconf-editor?
cairo-dock settings>visibility>visibility <-- dont put reserve space for dock
If you cant find that I dont know how else to tell you. I already looked it up for you
and I am going to sleep, good night. Ask in #cairo-dock if it is still causing problems
